meanings.sent1: Miscomputations can lead to incorrect results in math problems.
meanings.sent2: The accountant discovered miscomputations in the financial report.
meanings.sent3: The miscomputations in the budget caused quite a stir among the team.
meanings.sent4: Her miscomputations were like tiny gremlins messing with the numbers.
meanings.sent5: The miscomputations glared at her from the page, mocking her mistake.

meanings.definition: Mistakes made during the process of computing.
meanings.sent1: Double-check your work to avoid miscomputations in your calculations.
meanings.sent2: The miscomputations in the program caused it to crash unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: His miscomputations were so frequent, they became a running joke in the office.
meanings.sent4: The miscomputations danced around his mind, clouding his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The miscomputations whispered doubts into his thoughts, causing confusion.
